titleNullable: Advanced Horse Speed Forecast: Time & Climate
subtitleNullable: Predict horse speeds based on weather and race time
descriptionNullable:
Files
train_final.csv - This is the training dataset. It contains historical data on horse races, including the date, race time, weather conditions, and the actual horse speed.
test_final.csv - This is the test dataset. It provides information on the races' date, race time, and weather conditions but omits the actual horse speed. Your task is to predict the horse speed for these races.
sample_submission_final.csv - A sample submission file in the correct format, demonstrating how to format your predictions.
Columns
Date - The date on which the race took place.
Race_Time - The specific time the race started.
Weather - Describes the weather condition during the race. It can be 'Sunny', 'Cloudy', 'Rainy', or 'Stormy'.
Horse_Speed (only in training data) - Represents the speed of the horse during the race.
ID (specifically for submission) - A combination of the date, race time, and an index, used to uniquely identify each race in the test set.
Objective
Your main objective is to predict the Horse Speed for each race in the test set based on the given conditions.
